rmAccess.notes: SHA512 hash authentication works. Grants service level 1 edit access.

rmStructure_with_password.notes: Returns same structure as without password. Service categories (pass_index > 0) are visible but NO parameters (type: 1) follow them.
rmStructure_with_password.finding: Parameters under service categories are NOT exposed by API - firmware security

rmParamsData_with_password.notes: Same 165 parameters as without password. All user-level parameters.

conclusions.authentication: Works correctly with SHA512 hashed password
conclusions.service_parameters: Not exposed by API - hidden at firmware level
conclusions.security_model: API shows category structure but hides service parameter values
conclusions.integration_impact: All user-accessible parameters available; service params require physical panel
